content.rendered:
Harry Potter Week

We’re celebrating the week of Harry Potter’s birthday and the release of Harry Potter and the Cursed Child. From July 25-29, you can enter for a chance to win prizes, including a NEW Harry Potter book set! All you do to enter is bring a broom to any of our store locations. One entry per day, per location.

Night by Elie Wiesel

Elie Wiesel, Holocaust survivor and Nobel laureate, died last week. Read more about his story here and a sample of his work, A God Who Remembers. You can also pick up used or new copies of his most recognized book, Night, at our stores.

Kid’s Corner

We have four more Kid’s Corner events this summer. Marco’s Pizza will visit us in Warner Robins on July 12. Caring Solutions will visit our Macon store on July 14. We’ll see you at 10:30 a.m.!

School Orders

Back to school = school orders! Many school districts have discovered the benefits of placing their orders (both large and small) with Gottwals Books. We offer the lowest prices of any book vendor. We are even cheaper than buying online!
